about:
Hello! I'm Anas ur Rasheed, a Software Engineer based in Mannheim, Germany.

I am an experienced Web App developer with a proven track record of successfully creating web applications that are both well-received and commercially viable. I have over almost 6 years of solid experience in App development using Angular, React JS, Node JS, Nest JS, Express JS, GCP, and E2E testing. My expertise encompasses technical design, web application architectures, UI/UX design, and unit testing.

I possess a solid understanding of the application lifecycle, data-binding, dependency injection, design principles, best practices, and user experience. I am a team player with a demonstrated history of working in the information technology and services industry.

My technical skills include proficiency in Angular 2+, Ionic 3, React, Node JS, Nest JS, Java Spring Boot, Express.JS, Socket.IO, PHP, SQL, MySQL, DynamoDB, MongoDB, WordPress, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS, and SCSS. I also have hands-on experience with data security, systems security, and application security.

I am currently pursuing a Master's degree in Research in Computer and System Engineering part-time at the Technical University Ilmenau in Germany, which is also about to finish. Additionally, I hold a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science from Hamdard University, Pakistan.
